name: release-notes
description: Generates release notes by collecting commit messages between git tag and current commit
author: Alexander Kharkevich

inputs.name: releaseNotesFrom
inputs.label: Generate release notes from
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag or sha commit to start from. If not specified, the latest tag or the first commit will be used.

inputs.name: releaseNotesTo
inputs.label: Generate release notes to
inputs.helpMarkDown: The tag or sha commit to end with. If not specified, the current commit (HEAD) will be used.

inputs.name: releaseNotesPath
inputs.label: Location of release notes file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the release notes file. If not specified, the release notes will be generated in the current directory with RELEASE_NOTES.md as a default name.

inputs.name: releaseNotesTemplatePath
inputs.label: Location of release notes template
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the release notes template. If not specified, embedded template (template.md.hbs) will used.

inputs.name: releaseNotesVersion
inputs.label: Release notes version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version of the release notes. Will be omitted if not specified.
